title: How did dancing with Miley Cyrus cost Robin Thicke his marriage? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't think it was the dance with Miley. There were a lot of "those type" of instances and finally, that was the straw that broke the camel's back. I really never understood this entitlement that celebrities think they have. They are no better or worse than I am. Plenty of us have had a dance or two with a sexy person, and it didn't matter to our partner. If you have a secure partner/relationship, it helps to put more things into perspective. Also, being in the spotlight is worse, as your dirty laundry is judged harshly.

The infamous “twerking incident” did nothing to help Robin's home life. But there were other things going on. Supposedly, he was abusing drugs and fooling around with other women. The incident with Miley Cyrus may have been the straw that broke the camel's back.
